Articles.Content:
A cursory glance through the forum didn't turn up any salient meme flag threads, so I made some meme flags of my own. Requests are welcome! No guarantees I'll do everybody's idea of course, but all suggestions will be considered.

But enough serious stuff, on to the flags!

Obviously most of the flags aren't my original idea, but the way I see it memes are effectively public domain. I did optimize all of them for KSP, including the proper aspect ratio, a transparent background, and a subtle white outline where necessary so that images with dark edges don't blend in with the background on dark ships.

Full download: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/13276416/KSP/MemeFlags.zip

P.S. I was forced to pick a prefix and the only choices were "part" and "plugin"... and this seemed closer to being a part.

Edited April 8, 2014 by parameciumkid
Requesting update to include business cat and my all time favourite philosoraptor

We need a grumpy cat one.

Also, make sure the backgrounds are all transparent so they work as decals in 0.23.5!
